General.Name: Eastern Province Cement Co.
General.Description: Eastern Province Cement Company produces and sells clinker and cement in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Cement and Precast. The Cement segment engages in the manufacture and wholesale of ordinary, salt-resistant, and clinker cement. The Precast segment provides partitions, frames, and prefabricated buildings from prefabricated concrete. It also engages in the operation of quarries, mining of gypsum and anhydrite, and wholesale of cement and gypsum. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Eastern Cement Towers, Dammam, Saudi Arabia, 31412
